resources.string:
Take a photo of any valid ID of the BILECO Account Holder such as the following:


-Philippine passport
 -SSS UMID Card
 -Driver's license
 -PhilHealth ID
 -TIN Card
 -Postal ID
 -Voter's ID
 -Professional Regulation Commission ID
 -Senior Citizen ID
 -OFW ID


This information is required for validation of details and for claiming of prizes during the raffle event.

Biliran Electric Cooperative, Inc. shall protect the data that you provided in compliance with the Data Privacy Law and its implementing rules and regulations. The Company will not collect, disclose or process personal data, including data that may be classified as personal information and/or sensitive personal information unless you voluntarily choose to provide us with it and give your consent thereto, or unless such disclosure is required by applicable laws and regulations.

By clicking `I Agree`, you confirm that you freely and voluntarily give consent to the collection of data, which may include personal information and/or sensitive information set out in this form and/or otherwise provided by you or possessed by the Company for one or more purpose as stated below. The Company shall use the Data for the following purpose:

a. Capture of Digital Signature, Photo of a valid ID, Contact Details and Personal Information related to your BILECO Account strictly for the purpose of generating reports required by the National Electrification Agency (NEA) in relation with the upcoming online Annual General Membership Assembly attendance generation.

b. Keep records of the data mentioned in the previous item to opt out with the face-to-face AGMA in relation with the current pandemic situation to avoid transmission of COVID-19.

You hereby authorize BILECO to collect and process the data indicated herein for the purpose of effecting control of the COVID-19 infection and the ease of participating with the event of the company. You understand that your personal information is protected by RA 10173, Data Privacy Act of 2012
